articles.title: Gut microbiome remodeling induced by microplastic exposure in humans.
articles.summary: Microplastic exposure significantly alters gut microbiome composition, reducing beneficial bacteria and potentially increasing risks of gastrointestinal and inflammatory diseases.

articles.title: The colloidal stability of albumin-based drug delivery systems has a profound effect on tumoricidal activity.
articles.summary: Researchers developed more stable HSA-PLA nanoparticles for paclitaxel delivery, improving tumor drug exposure and effectiveness compared to Abraxane.

articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary: Manipulating gut microbes shows promise in improving immunotherapy effectiveness for urothelial carcinoma by enhancing immune system response.

articles.title: Effects of estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene on human temporal lobe cortex astroglial cell spreading.
articles.summary: Estradiol and related compounds alter the shape and spreading of brain cells called astrocytes, which may impact neurological processes.
